title: @Reav3 So.. Why isn't Xin Zhou getting a VGU?
body:
Both his model and kit are old as heck and he's pretty linear. I'd be much more interested in him getting a VGU to play up the spear wielder theme.

Why an update the size of a class?

replies.body: We expect he'll get one eventually. We talked about him as a possibility for next year however and concluded there were other champs who needed a VGU more. That meant that a smaller update for Xin made sense, given there's definite improvement possible working within most of the constraints of the current kit and a VGU's at least 1.5 years away.

2 question :
- When will be ur next  Quick Gameplay Thoughts
- u said {{champion:62}} wasn't high in priority... but can we hope to have a little update at least to give him a passive ?

Next post should be tomorrow, I'm generally aiming for a Tuesday and Friday of each week schedule at the moment.

I'd imagine whenever we get a chance to do smaller work on Wukong it'll include some passive stuff. Uncertain when that'll be though.
Akali has a buff to her W on the PBE right now. Any insight into why she is getting buffed to begin with?
Will he get an updated splash art to go along with the rework? A year and a half is awhile for him to get a VGU and a new splash

How about taking a hard look at irelia's passive or tenacity as a whole. Irelia's bassive not only does is absolutely suck right now because it is so weak, but even if it was at an okay strength tenacity has a very strong need to be modernized with almost half of the hard CC in league being displacement.
Because Xin's ult and Q are pretty unique and decent abilities, all he needs is a W, E, or passive change, and visual update, and he should be good to go.
